We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private FisherTransform _fish;
// In Initialize()
_fish = FISH(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_fish.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "FISH Is Ready", _fish.IsReady);
    Plot("My Indicators", "FISH Warm Up Period", _fish.WarmUpPeriod);
    Plot("My Indicators", "FISH Current", _fish.Current);
    Plot("My Indicators", "FISH Name", _fish.Name);
    Plot("My Indicators", "FISH Samples", _fish.Samples);
}
# In Initialize()
self.fish = self.FISH(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.fish.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "FISH Is Ready", self.fish.IsReady);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "FISH Warm Up Period", self.fish.WarmUpPeriod);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "FISH Current", self.fish.Current);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "FISH Name", self.fish.Name);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "FISH Samples", self.fish.Samples);
